Name: Ded Inside
About the game: Ded Inside is a topdown shooter in a large open location, where you destroy the demons who invaded our world. Through the portal opened from this side, demons invaded our world, they began to turn ordinary people into devils. Any weapon does not take them, there is only one way to kill them and that is vodka! A grandfather who has a cms grenade decides to confront the demonic enemy. Features: • You play for grandfather • Good pixel art • Boss battles • Secondary tasks • Bullet Hell • It has three endings
